00017 #include <gtest/gtest.h>

00019 #include "graph.h"
00020 #include "ninja.h"
00021 
00022 struct ParserTest : public testing::Test,
00023                     public ManifestParser::FileReader {
00024   void AssertParse(const char* input) {
00025     ManifestParser parser(&state, this);
00026     string err;
00027     ASSERT_TRUE(parser.Parse(input, &err)) << err;
00028     ASSERT_EQ("", err);
00029   }
00030 
00031   virtual bool ReadFile(const string& path, string* content, string* err) {
00032     files_read_.push_back(path);
00033     map<string, string>::iterator i = files_.find(path);
00034     if (i == files_.end()) {
00035       *err = "file not found";
00036       return false;
00037     }
00038     *content = i->second;
00039     return true;
00040   }
00041 
00042   State state;
00043   map<string, string> files_;
00044   vector<string> files_read_;
00045 };
00046 
00047 TEST_F(ParserTest, Empty) {
00048   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(""));
00049 }
00050 
00051 TEST_F(ParserTest, Rules) {
00052   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00053 "rule cat\n"
00054 "  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00055 "\n"
00056 "rule date\n"
00057 "  command = date > $out\n"
00058 "\n"
00059 "build result: cat in_1.cc in-2.O\n"));
00060 
00061   ASSERT_EQ(3, state.rules_.size());
00062   const Rule* rule = state.rules_.begin()->second;
00063   EXPECT_EQ("cat", rule->name_);
00064   EXPECT_EQ("cat $in > $out", rule->command_.unparsed());
00065 }
00066 
00067 TEST_F(ParserTest, Variables) {
00068   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00069 "l = one-letter-test\n"
00070 "rule link\n"
00071 "  command = ld $l $extra $with_under -o $out $in\n"
00072 "\n"
00073 "extra = -pthread\n"
00074 "with_under = -under\n"
00075 "build a: link b c\n"
00076 "nested1 = 1\n"
00077 "nested2 = $nested1/2\n"
00078 "build supernested: link x\n"
00079 "  extra = $nested2/3\n"));
00080 
00081   ASSERT_EQ(2, state.edges_.size());
00082   Edge* edge = state.edges_[0];
00083   EXPECT_EQ("ld one-letter-test -pthread -under -o a b c",
00084             edge->EvaluateCommand());
00085   EXPECT_EQ("1/2", state.bindings_.LookupVariable("nested2"));
00086 
00087   edge = state.edges_[1];
00088   EXPECT_EQ("ld one-letter-test 1/2/3 -under -o supernested x",
00089             edge->EvaluateCommand());
00090 }
00091 
00092 TEST_F(ParserTest, VariableScope) {
00093   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00094 "foo = bar\n"
00095 "rule cmd\n"
00096 "  command = cmd $foo $in $out\n"
00097 "\n"
00098 "build inner: cmd a\n"
00099 "  foo = baz\n"
00100 "build outer: cmd b\n"
00101 "\n"  // Extra newline after build line tickles a regression.
00102 ));
00103 
00104   ASSERT_EQ(2, state.edges_.size());
00105   EXPECT_EQ("cmd baz a inner", state.edges_[0]->EvaluateCommand());
00106   EXPECT_EQ("cmd bar b outer", state.edges_[1]->EvaluateCommand());
00107 }
00108 
00109 TEST_F(ParserTest, Continuation) {
00110   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00111 "rule link\n"
00112 "  command = foo bar \\\n"
00113 "    baz\n"
00114 "\n"
00115 "build a: link c \\\n"
00116 " d e f\n"));
00117 
00118   ASSERT_EQ(2, state.rules_.size());
00119   const Rule* rule = state.rules_.begin()->second;
00120   EXPECT_EQ("link", rule->name_);
00121   EXPECT_EQ("foo bar baz", rule->command_.unparsed());
00122 }
00123 
00124 TEST_F(ParserTest, Backslash) {
00125   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00126 "foo = bar\\baz\n"
00127 "foo2 = bar\\ baz\n"
00128 ));
00129   EXPECT_EQ("bar\\baz", state.bindings_.LookupVariable("foo"));
00130   EXPECT_EQ("bar\\ baz", state.bindings_.LookupVariable("foo2"));
00131 }
00132 
00133 TEST_F(ParserTest, Comment) {
00134   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00135 "# this is a comment\n"
00136 "foo = not # a comment\n"));
00137   EXPECT_EQ("not # a comment", state.bindings_.LookupVariable("foo"));
00138 }

00140 TEST_F(ParserTest, CanonicalizeFile) {
00141   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00142 "rule cat\n"
00143 "  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00144 "build out: cat in/1 in//2\n"
00145 "build in/1: cat\n"
00146 "build in/2: cat\n"));
00147 
00148   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("in/1"));
00149   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("in/2"));
00150   EXPECT_FALSE(state.LookupNode("in//1"));
00151   EXPECT_FALSE(state.LookupNode("in//2"));
00152 }
00153 
00154 TEST_F(ParserTest, PathVariables) {
00155   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00156 "rule cat\n"
00157 "  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00158 "dir = out\n"
00159 "build $dir/exe: cat src\n"));
00160 
00161   EXPECT_FALSE(state.LookupNode("$dir/exe"));
00162   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("out/exe"));
00163 }
00164 
00165 TEST_F(ParserTest, CanonicalizePaths) {
00166   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00167 "rule cat\n"
00168 "  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00169 "build ./out.o: cat ./bar/baz/../foo.cc\n"));
00170 
00171   EXPECT_FALSE(state.LookupNode("./out.o"));
00172   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("out.o"));
00173   EXPECT_FALSE(state.LookupNode("./bar/baz/../foo.cc"));
00174   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("bar/foo.cc"));
00175 }
00176 
00177 TEST_F(ParserTest, Errors) {
00178   {
00179     ManifestParser parser(NULL, NULL);
00180     string err;
00181     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("foobar", &err));
00182     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 7: expected '=', got eof", err);
00183   }
00184 
00185   {
00186     ManifestParser parser(NULL, NULL);
00187     string err;
00188     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("x 3", &err));
00189     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 3: expected '=', got '3'", err);
00190   }
00191 
00192   {
00193     ManifestParser parser(NULL, NULL);
00194     string err;
00195     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("x = 3", &err));
00196     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 6: expected newline, got eof", err);
00197   }
00198 
00199   {
00200     State state;
00201     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00202     string err;
00203     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("x = 3\ny 2", &err));
00204     EXPECT_EQ("line 2, col 3: expected '=', got '2'", err);
00205   }
00206 
00207   {
00208     State state;
00209     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00210     string err;
00211     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("x = $\n", &err));
00212     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 6: expected variable after $", err);
00213   }
00214 
00215   {
00216     State state;
00217     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00218     string err;
00219     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("x = \\\n $[\n", &err));
00220     EXPECT_EQ("line 2, col 3: expected variable after $", err);
00221   }
00222 
00223   {
00224     State state;
00225     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00226     string err;
00227     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("x = a\\\n b\\\n $\n", &err));
00228     EXPECT_EQ("line 3, col 3: expected variable after $", err);
00229   }
00230 
00231   {
00232     State state;
00233     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00234     string err;
00235     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("build x: y z\n", &err));
00236     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 10: unknown build rule 'y'", err);
00237   }
00238 
00239   {
00240     State state;
00241     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00242     string err;
00243     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("build x:: y z\n", &err));
00244     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 9: expected build command name, got ':'", err);
00245   }
00246 
00247   {
00248     State state;
00249     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00250     string err;
00251     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule cat\n  command = cat ok\n"
00252                               "build x: cat \\\n :\n",
00253                               &err));
00254     EXPECT_EQ("line 4, col 2: expected newline, got ':'", err);
00255   }
00256 
00257   {
00258     State state;
00259     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00260     string err;
00261     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule cat\n",
00262                               &err));
00263     EXPECT_EQ("line 2, col 1: expected 'command =' line", err);
00264   }
00265 
00266   {
00267     State state;
00268     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00269     string err;
00270     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule %foo\n",
00271                               &err));
00272     EXPECT_EQ("line 1, col 6: expected rule name, got unknown '%'", err);
00273   }
00274 
00275   {
00276     State state;
00277     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00278     string err;
00279     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule cc\n  command = foo\n  depfile = bar\n"
00280                               "build a.o b.o: cc c.cc\n",
00281                               &err));
00282     EXPECT_EQ("line 4, col 16: dependency files only work with "
00283               "single-output rules", err);
00284   }
00285 
00286   {
00287     State state;
00288     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00289     string err;
00290     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule cc\n  command = foo\n  othervar = bar\n",
00291                               &err));
00292     EXPECT_EQ("line 4, col 0: unexpected variable 'othervar'", err);
00293   }
00294 
00295   {
00296     State state;
00297     ManifestParser parser(&state, NULL);
00298     string err;
00299     EXPECT_FALSE(parser.Parse("rule cc\n  command = foo\n"
00300                               "build $: cc bar.cc\n",
00301                               &err));
00302     EXPECT_EQ("line 4, col 1: expected variable after $", err);
00303   }
00304 }

00306 TEST_F(ParserTest, SubNinja) {
00307   files_["test.ninja"] =
00308     "var = inner\n"
00309     "build $builddir/inner: varref\n";
00310   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00311 "builddir = some_dir/\n"
00312 "rule varref\n"
00313 "  command = varref $var\n"
00314 "var = outer\n"
00315 "build $builddir/outer: varref\n"
00316 "subninja test.ninja\n"
00317 "build $builddir/outer2: varref\n"));
00318   ASSERT_EQ(1, files_read_.size());
00319 
00320   EXPECT_EQ("test.ninja", files_read_[0]);
00321   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("some_dir/outer"));
00322   // Verify our builddir setting is inherited.
00323   EXPECT_TRUE(state.LookupNode("some_dir/inner"));
00324 
00325   ASSERT_EQ(3, state.edges_.size());
00326   EXPECT_EQ("varref outer", state.edges_[0]->EvaluateCommand());
00327   EXPECT_EQ("varref inner", state.edges_[1]->EvaluateCommand());
00328   EXPECT_EQ("varref outer", state.edges_[2]->EvaluateCommand());
00329 }
00330 
00331 TEST_F(ParserTest, Include) {
00332   files_["include.ninja"] = "var = inner\n";
00333   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00334 "var = outer\n"
00335 "include include.ninja\n"));
00336 
00337   ASSERT_EQ(1, files_read_.size());
00338   EXPECT_EQ("include.ninja", files_read_[0]);
00339   EXPECT_EQ("inner", state.bindings_.LookupVariable("var"));
00340 }

00342 TEST_F(ParserTest, Implicit) {
00343   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00344 "rule cat\n  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00345 "build foo: cat bar | baz\n"));
00346 
00347   Edge* edge = state.LookupNode("foo")->in_edge_;
00348   ASSERT_TRUE(edge->is_implicit(1));
00349 }
00350 
00351 TEST_F(ParserTest, OrderOnly) {
00352   ASSERT_NO_FATAL_FAILURE(AssertParse(
00353 "rule cat\n  command = cat $in > $out\n"
00354 "build foo: cat bar || baz\n"));
00355 
00356   Edge* edge = state.LookupNode("foo")->in_edge_;
00357   ASSERT_TRUE(edge->is_order_only(1));
00358 }

00360 TEST(MakefileParser, Basic) {
00361   MakefileParser parser;
00362   string err;
00363   EXPECT_TRUE(parser.Parse(
00364 "build/ninja.o: ninja.cc ninja.h eval_env.h manifest_parser.h\n",
00365       &err));
00366   ASSERT_EQ("", err);
00367 }

00369 TEST(MakefileParser, EarlyNewlineAndWhitespace) {
00370   MakefileParser parser;
00371   string err;
00372   EXPECT_TRUE(parser.Parse(
00373 " \\\n"
00374 "  out: in\n",
00375       &err));
00376   ASSERT_EQ("", err);
00377 }
